TopicTitle: A big: How ya gettin' on, B'y? From Newfoundland Canada

Articles.Content: Hey! A friend told me to download Kerbal to give it a try. I was skeptical at first, Because of lack of content and graphics, But I tried it anyway and became addicted!

So now, 3 orbits and many dead Kerbals later, I think i'm going to stick around and see where this game will be in 2 years.

 ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Glad to see you gave us a try and are willing to stick around.

Happy Launching!

Skunky
